name: Nekomimi is Hungry
description:
Run around in the dungeon and catch all the fish!
Find the secret bait!
If your fishing line breaks you die.

There is no victory condition, the dungeon loops forever.

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
Fish/Interact: Spacebar
Hook fish:  WASD or Arrow Keys

LD41 jam by @parkdraws
Background by @colinbrown_
